rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0001
rows.name: Hmm? Honey...?

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh! You brought the
Melosian Honey! Thank you!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I was too busy with Militia
Corps work to go to Skeet's
Nest and get it myself.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0004
rows.name:
It's dangerous because of the monsters,
so no one would go for me...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0005
rows.name: That's it!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0006
rows.name:
I can see that you are a very
kind and courageous person!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0007
rows.name:
It's a bit of a strange
segue from honey, but...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Would you like to join
the Militia Corps?!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to
make you uncomfortable.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0010
rows.name:
The consul of Torigo went missing
during the recent commotion...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0011
rows.name:
Perhaps because of that, there's
been an unfortunate trend of
skirmishes breaking out.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0012
rows.name:
Ah... For example, there's
a Nopon staying illegally
somewhere in this town.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0018
rows.name:
And there was a dispute between
the town's residents and the
Imperial army at the Torigo base...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0013
rows.name:
Seeing the adults like that, the
Gulan and Superbian children have
started to fight each other...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0019
rows.name:
Also, Hula-san consulted me about
being unable to get new stock
since the consul went missing.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0014
rows.name:
We can't just let this go on,
but the Militia Corps alone
doesn't have enough hands.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0015
rows.name:
Just a little help is fine.
Could you cooperate with us?

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0016
rows.name: You'll do it?! That's a great help!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0017
rows.name:
The four reports of trouble I've received
from my comrades are the ones I just
mentioned. I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0103
rows.name:
This town has many problems. For
example, there's a Nopon staying
illegally somewhere in this town.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0101
rows.name:
When you've finished everything,
come and report to me.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0102
rows.name:
We're counting on your cooperation
with the Militia Corps!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0201
rows.name:
I've been hearing reports
from my comrades!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0202
rows.name:
Your efficiency is wonderful! That
was a great help, thank you!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0203
rows.name:
What former consul Morph did was
by no means praiseworthy, but
the town was relatively calm.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0204
rows.name:
He must have been doing
the work of governing the
town behind the scenes.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0205
rows.name:
That said, I hope the next
consul is a decent person.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0206
rows.name:
No, in fact, if Superbia
were to leave...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0207
rows.name:
Oops, sorry. There's no point
in telling you that, is there?

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0208
rows.name:
Even without a consul,
this is our town.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0209
rows.name:
We'll do our best to solve
our own problems ourselves!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0210
rows.name:
It's just a small token,
but please take it.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0211
rows.name:
You were the one who
helped us. Thank you!
